name: Super Bernie World
content:
files:
- master.zip: https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install/archive/master.zip
- SteamSetup.exe: https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/SteamSetup.exe
game:
  appid: '1258040'
  arch: win64
  args: -nojoy -applaunch 1258040
  custom-name: Super Bernie World
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/Steam.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/
    src: SteamSetup.exe
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
- task:
    app: d3drm
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX 11 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx11_43
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX 11 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    arch: win64
    description: DirectX compiler ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dxvk
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Steam ...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win8
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 8 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  esync: true
